rules_text:
{1}{B}: Return Bone Lich from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Surveil 1. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
{3}{B}{B}, Exile Bone Lich from your graveyard: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Activate only as a sorcery.
